00018 class FunctionParameterValueBase {
00019     public:
00020         /* It seems I have to declare the getters and setters for every type of
00021         derived classes that will be instantiated. PITA.
00022         what's worse, i have to define no-ops as default implementation. that
00023         totally breaks type-safety during compilation.                         */
00024         virtual const double &getValue() const { static double x = 0; return x; }
00025         //  "templates may not be virtual". blah.
00026         virtual void setValue(const double &) { }
00027         virtual operator double() = 0;
00028 };
00029 
00030 template <typename T> class FunctionParameterValue:
00031         public FunctionParameterValueBase {
00032     public:
00033         FunctionParameterValue<T>(const T &_value): value(_value) { }
00034 
00035         virtual const T &getValue() const { return value; }
00036         virtual void setValue(const T &_value) { value = _value; }
00037         virtual operator double() { return (double)value; }
00038 
00039     private:
00040         T value;
00041 };
00042 
00043 class FunctionParameter {
00044     public:
00045         FunctionParameter(const std::string &_name,
00046                           const std::string &_description = ""):
00047             pImpl(new Impl(_name, _description)) {}
00048         ~FunctionParameter() { delete pImpl; }
00049 
00050         const std::string &getName() const { return pImpl->name; }
00051         void setName(const std::string &_name) { pImpl->name = _name; }
00052         const std::string &getDescription() const { return pImpl->description; }
00053         void setDescription(const std::string &_description) {
00054             pImpl->description = _description;
00055         }
00056         operator double() { return (double)(*(pImpl->value));}
00057         template<typename T> void setValue(FunctionParameterValue<T> *_value) {
00058             if (!pImpl->value) delete pImpl->value;
00059             pImpl->value = _value;
00060         }
00061         const double &getValue() { return pImpl->value->getValue(); }
00062 
00063         const double &getDefaultValue() const {
00064             return pImpl->defaultValue->getValue();
00065         }
00066         template<typename T> void setDefaultValue(
00067                 FunctionParameterValue<T> *_defaultValue) {
00068             if (!pImpl->defaultValue) delete pImpl->defaultValue;
00069             pImpl->defaultValue = _defaultValue;
00070         }
00071 
00072         std::string &name() { return pImpl->name; }
00073         std::string &name() const { return pImpl->name; }
00074         std::string &description() { return pImpl->description; }
00075         std::string &description() const { return pImpl->description; }
00076         FunctionParameterValueBase *value() { return pImpl->value; }
00077         const FunctionParameterValueBase *value() const { return pImpl->value; }
00078         FunctionParameterValueBase *defaultValue() {
00079             return pImpl->defaultValue;
00080         }
00081         FunctionParameterValueBase *defaultValue() const {
00082             return pImpl->defaultValue;
00083         }
00084 
00085     private:
00086         struct Impl {
00087             Impl(const std::string &_name,
00088                           const std::string &_description = ""):
00089                     name(_name), description(_description), value(0),
00090                     defaultValue(0) {}
00091             ~Impl() {
00092                 delete value;
00093                 delete defaultValue;
00094             }
00095             std::string name;
00096             std::string description;
00097             FunctionParameterValueBase *value;
00098             FunctionParameterValueBase *defaultValue;
00099         };
00100         Impl *pImpl;
00101 };
00102 
00103 class ParameterFac {
00104     public:
00105         template <typename T>
00106                 FunctionParameter *createParameterWithValue(const std::string &_name,
00107                                                             const T &_value) {
00108             FunctionParameter *tmp = new FunctionParameter(_name);
00109             tmp->setValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_value));
00110 
00111             return tmp;
00112         }
00113 
00114         template <typename T>
00115                 FunctionParameter *createParameterWithDefault(const std::string &_name,
00116                                                               const T &_default,
00117                                                               const std::string &_description = "") {
00118             FunctionParameter *tmp = new FunctionParameter(_name, _description);
00119             // ...
00120 
00121             return tmp;
00122         }
00123     private:
00124 
00125 };
